attributes.action: request Gordon Brown to honour his promise to 0 rate VAT on utility bills.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 1997 the Chancellor reduced the VAT on utility bills from 7.5% to 5% with the promise that he would further reduce it to 0% when he could afford it. Surely now, after 10 years, he should be in a position to carry out his promise.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
